m_szDocSumamry: EV Battery Use Trumps Hybrid Battery Use September 7th, 2014 by Cynthia Shahan   Plug-in electric cars are still a very small percentage of the market compared to conventional hybrid cars, but their battery capacity is not so small. With plug-in car sales growing in leaps and bounds , their annual battery use already trump the annual battery use of hybrids, but what about all time use?
